name: Tri Endurance #4
description:
To achieve a successful cycling performance, you need good endurance. Endurance training is about improving your capacity to endure sustained exercise. 



This endurance (or ability to endure) then helps form a solid base of fitness to build more race-specific training. By implementing carefully structured intensity into your endurance training, your ability to become more fatigue resistant is enhanced.
